courierServices.ContainerClasses

Class Customers

  • java.lang.Object
    • courierServices.ContainerClasses.Customers
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Customers
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class representing all customers. This class also implements Serializable interface for writing object to file.
    Author:
    Shubham Kumar
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long CUSTOMER_INITIALIZER
      Customer Initializer: Provides base (minimum) value for customer ID Also stores last created customer ID.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Customers()
      Constructor : Initialize arraylist to empty list

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long addNewCustomer()
      Add New Customer: Takes input from console and generates new customer by adding newly created Customer class object to arraylist.
      void addOrderList(long orderId, long custId)
      Adds OrderID to customer account
      boolean authenticateCustomer(long custId, java.lang.String custPass)
      Checks whether details provided exists.
      Customers copy(Customers object)
      Function to copy Customers object.
      void displayCustomerOrderIDs(long custId)
      Displays all orders (IDs) for given customer, It compares passed customer ID with all customer IDs, and then calls PrintOrder function of Customer class to print all orders.
      void displayMyDetails(long custId)
      Displays All details of given customer.
      void printAllCustomers()
      Prints all customer details, with all details of single customer in a single row.
      static void printListHeader()
      Prints table header, When list of all customers is printed as ToString this function prints table header.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • CUSTOMER_INITIALIZER

        public static long CUSTOMER_INITIALIZER
        Customer Initializer: Provides base (minimum) value for customer ID Also stores last created customer ID.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Customers

        public Customers()
        Constructor : Initialize arraylist to empty list

    • Method Detail

      • printListHeader

        public static void printListHeader()
        Prints table header, When list of all customers is printed as ToString this function prints table header.

      • addNewCustomer

        public long addNewCustomer()
        Add New Customer: Takes input from console and generates new customer by adding newly created Customer class object to arraylist. New customer ID is selected using static CUSTOMER INITIALIZER variable, after creation CUSTOMER INITIALIZER variable is incremented by 1.
        Returns:
        Customer ID of created customer.

      • addOrderList

        public void addOrderList(long orderId,
                         long custId)
        Adds OrderID to customer account
        Parameters:
        orderId - - Order ID
        custId - - Customer ID

      • authenticateCustomer

        public boolean authenticateCustomer(long custId,
                                    java.lang.String custPass)
        Checks whether details provided exists.
        Parameters:
        custId - - Customer ID
        custPass - - Password
        Returns:
        boolean value (true/false)

      • copy

        public Customers copy(Customers object)
        Function to copy Customers object. It assigns arraylist of passed object to caller object.
        Parameters:
        object - - Customers object whose value to be equated
        Returns:
        this - in case of a condition a = b.copy(c);

      • displayCustomerOrderIDs

        public void displayCustomerOrderIDs(long custId)
        Displays all orders (IDs) for given customer, It compares passed customer ID with all customer IDs, and then calls PrintOrder function of Customer class to print all orders.
        Parameters:
        custId - - Customer ID

      • displayMyDetails

        public void displayMyDetails(long custId)
        Displays All details of given customer. It compares passed customer ID with all customer IDs, and then calls displayCustomerDetails function of Customer class
        Parameters:
        custId - - Customer ID

      • printAllCustomers

        public void printAllCustomers()
        Prints all customer details, with all details of single customer in a single row. It calls ToString method of Customer class for every customer.
